channel.title: Taste vengance!

item.title: Taste vengance!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just added a little line to DD code, this makes it look sort of like the real vengeance without the skull

case 165:
            // angry emote
            if (emotes == 0) {
               emotes = 1;
               pEmote = 1914;
               stillgfx(465, absX, absY);
               txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!";
                string4UpdateRequired = true;
               updateRequired = true;
               appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
               emotes = 0;
               pEmote = playerSE;
               updateRequired = true;
               appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }
            break;

Read full topic

item.title: Taste vengance!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Runegay, shut up?

case 165: // angry emote if (emotes == 0) { emotes = 1; pEmote = 1914; txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

item.title: Taste vengance!
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:6, topic:176136”][quote author=pure ownz01 link=topic=236836.msg2015286#msg2015286 date=1201348121]
where would i add that in? sorry i’m new at adding veng.
[/quote]

~step by step how to C+P; and declaring a method (or anything else)~

step 1. click to the left or right of the text you are about to copy. now drag the cursor to the opposite side of the text. this is called highlighting.

step 2. right click the highlighted portion of text, and click on the option that says “copy”. now, open your server, and then, right click anywhere (it would be helpful to add the snippets into the correct method of your server), and choose the paste option this time.

YAY! You have declared an int using the ever popular, C+P (or copy and paste for the less intelligent)[/quote]
omg i never knew what c+p was and i didnt know how to highlight u are chuck norris rep++!
NOT!!!

Read full topic
